metadata.title: CVE-2023-6857 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: When resolving a symlink, a race may occur where the buffer passed to`readlink` may actually be smaller than necessary.*This bug only affects Firefox on Unix-based operating systems (Android,Linux, MacOS). Windows is unaffected.* This vulnerability affects FirefoxESR < 115.6, Thunderbird < 115.6, and Firefox < 121.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
